item.title: UK: Suella Braverman defects from Conservatives to Reform - dw.com
item.description: UK: Suella Braverman defects from Conservatives to Reform dw.comSuella Braverman accuses Tories of betrayal as she defects to Reform UK BBCSuella Braverman becomes latest Tory MP to defect to Reform UK Financial TimesUK right-wing Reform attracts another Conservative defector, Suella Braverman ReutersSuella makes the ultimate sacrifice as she ditches Tories for Reform | John Crace The Guardian
